text: Rakesh Pandey (born 14 August 1952) is an Indian politician and a member of Bahujan Samaj Party. He was a Member of Parliament in the 15th Lok Sabha from Ambedkar Nagar and a member of Committee on Rural Development. From 2002 to 2007, he was a Member of the Legislative Assembly in the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly. ==Personal life== Pandey was born in Kotwa Mohamadpur in Ambedkar Nagar district of Uttar Pradesh to Jagmohan Pandey and Raghuraji Devi. He studied till matriculation. Pandey married Manju Pandey on 29 June 1971. They have two sons. His younger son, Ritesh Pandey is a MLA from Jalalpur. His older son, Ashish Pandey is a Lucknow based real estate businessman. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:15th Lok Sabha members Category:Uttar Pradesh MLAs 2002–2007 Category:Bahujan Samaj Party politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:People from Ambedkar Nagar district
title: Rakesh Pandey (politician, born 1952)
